title: Bernabé Rivera (footballer)
text: Bernabé Rivera Núñez was a <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Paraguay%20national%20football%20team">Paraguay</a> in the <a href="1930%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1930 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Club%20Sportivo%20Luque%C3%B1o">Club Sportivo Luqueño</a>.
